Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2013 03:52PM Hbruno wrote: Hi, I'm Heather.  I was diagnosed in May of 2012, my initial diagnosis with mets to all of my bones.  I have three kids, two girls, 19(1993), and 17 (1995).  My son is 7 (2005).  I am a single mom, working full time, and trying to truly understand what is happening to me.  This is my first post, and I am excited to meet others who share in this diagnosis.  Finding groups for Stage IV has been difficult!!
Posts.Title: Roll Call 2013 LilSchatzie reader123
